*** Sat, 3 Sep 2016 22:31:48 ***
TEST FOR GRANGER-CAUSALITY:
H0: "realcons" do not Granger-cause "realgdp, realinv"

Test statistic l = 10.6287
pval-F( l; 8, 555) = 0.0000 

TEST FOR INSTANTANEOUS CAUSALITY:
H0: No instantaneous causality between "realcons" and "realgdp, realinv"

Test statistic: c = 71.0006
pval-Chi( c; 2) = 0.0000
